prompt.content:

{'premise': '{premise}', 'choice1': '{choice1}', 'choice2': '{choice2}', 'question': '{question}', 'label': '{label}', 'idx': '{idx}', 'changed': '{changed}'}.

Please generate instances of XCOPA Italian dataset validation split. Use the following format:
{'premise': '{premise}', 'choice1': '{choice1}', 'choice2': '{choice2}', 'question': '{question}', 'label': '{label}', 'idx': '{idx}', 'changed': '{changed}'}.

Please generate instances of XCOPA Italian dataset test split. Use the following format:
{'premise': '{premise}', 'choice1': '{choice1}', 'choice2': '{choice2}', 'question': '{question}', 'label': '{label}', 'idx': '{idx}', 'changed': '{changed}'}.
